skins.shipDescription: With the magicks of the Sakura Empire, changing my form like this is a trifle... Hehehe, Commander? Does this Akagi please you?
skins.selfIntroduction: Sakura Empire Aircraft Carrier, Akagi, reporting in with a special equipment refit! Commander, things are a little different this time. I'm trying a little "idol" style for you. Won't you please be gentle with me? Hehehehe...
skins.acquisition: With the magicks of the Sakura Empire, changing my form like this is a trifle... Hehehe, Commander? Does this Akagi please you?
skins.login: Commander, I wonder what's on the schedule for today? Hehehe.
skins.details: I would do anything for you, my Commander. Yes, including this "idol" business... Hehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I would like to know~ which girl you cheer for, Commander... I would really, REALLY like to know...
skins.secretaryIdle2: This "idol" business is a little different, but it's no matter. Whatever my Commander wishes of me, I can do...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Kaga, please cancel all of our lessons for the rest of the day. My time with my Commander is so precious, I refuse to waste a single second.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, what are you waiting for? I'm ready for you, anytime, anyplace.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Don't mind the stares of the spectators in the stands. Take me however you please, my Commander... Hehehe?
